modName: Dark Mage Robes Stand Alone Retexture
summary: A Dark Retexture of the mage robes (my first mod for skyrim) It is found in a chest at the blacksmith forge in riverwood . They have their own stats and an armor rating and they\'re enchanted so they\'ll be usefull.They are stand alone.
descriptionHtml: The Robes can be found at the blacksmith forge in riverwood these Dark Mage Robes Respawn so you don\\\'t have to worry about losing them they look good in my opinion it would help me if you endorse this file as i\'m looking to start several more mods. Tell me your opinion in the comments. This armor IS stand alone.
author: Demon8022
